summary.para: Implement this method to receive progress notification of the current erase operation.

param.name: object
param.para: The interface that initiated the erase operation.
This parameter is a MsftDiscFormat2Erase object in script.

param.name: elapsedSeconds
param.para: Elapsed time, in seconds, of the erase operation.

param.name: estimatedTotalSeconds
param.para: Estimated time, in seconds, to complete the erase operation.

remarks.para: Notifications are sent in response to calling the method.
Notification is sent every 0.5 or 1.0 seconds depending on the method required to blank the media.
Total time estimates for a single erasure can vary as the operation progresses. The drive provides updated information that can affect the projected duration of the erasure.

summary.para: Implement this interface to receive notifications of the current erase operation.
